author: lightclient
content: I responded with some of my thoughts: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/231#issuecomment-739720482

author: sky.cactus
content: You make a very good point that I failed to consider that RLP Envelope and Custom RLP Encoding both have discrimination problems!

author: sky.cactus
content: I think for me that puts me strongly against both of them.

author: sky.cactus
content: Leaving the two you picked out as your choices as the only "viable" options.  I still favor opaque bytes personally.

author: sky.cactus
content: Can you add that last note to your summary <@543900561460822016>?  The thing about "MUST NOT propagate typed transactions prior to fork block".
